meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Push open</kanji> the door to the conversation that is going to <kanji>be imminent</kanji> by saying the proper <vocabulary>greeting</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>salutation</vocabulary>. This word might also refer to a short <vocabulary>speech</vocabulary> you give at an event or ceremony.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned them already, so you should be able to read this on your own!
